system.description: Merchants are savvy traders who use their wealth and social connections to support their allies. Their ability to acquire rare items and manipulate markets makes them invaluable support characters.

features.name: Deep Pockets
features.description: You start with an additional 5g, and you gain 1g at the start of each session.

features.name: Connections
features.description: You gain the Silver Tongue Perk. In any settlement, you can find a contact who can help you acquire goods, information, or services.

features.name: Appraisal
features.description: You can determine the exact value of any item, and you have Favor on Checks to identify magical items.

features.name: Haggle
features.description: You buy items for 75% of their listed price and sell items for 75% of their value (instead of 50%).

features.name: Investment
features.description: During downtime, you can invest gold. At the start of the next session, roll a d6: on 4-6, you gain 50% profit; on 2-3, you break even; on 1, you lose 50%.

features.name: Black Market
features.description: You can acquire any item regardless of its legality or rarity, given enough time and gold.

features.name: Tycoon
features.description: Your session gold increases to 3g, and your investments always succeed (minimum break even on a 1).
